name: test_get_task
description: Generates new task and check if task with such data exists using ID

steps.name: Create new task with body: {'name': 'cold975'}, expected status code: 200

Create url with base url and endpoint: /list/901510919856/task
Result URL: https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/list/901510919856/task
Send POST request to https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/list/901510919856/task with json={'name': 'cold975'} and data=None, expected status code 200
Verify created task with ID: 86c3ff1b2 exists
Fetch task object by ID: 86c3ff1b2, expected status code: 200

Create url with base url and endpoint: /task/86c3ff1b2
Result URL: https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/86c3ff1b2
Send GET request to https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/86c3ff1b2 with json=None and data=None, expected status code 200
Fetch task object by ID: 86c3ff1b2, expected status code: 200

Create url with base url and endpoint: /task/86c3ff1b2
Result URL: https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/86c3ff1b2
Send GET request to https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/86c3ff1b2 with json=None and data=None, expected status code 200
